website_summaries.verdict: A top of the line waterless car wash that includes extra cleaning products such as a bug remover.
pros: The general purpose wash, wax, and bug remover blend offers a lot of value for the price
Bug remover takes little time to lift spatters and messes with ease
cons: The waterless wash can leave some areas of dust and streaks on darker color vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Paint real Slick feeling.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works fantastic. Gets the car super clean and it left the paints super slick feeling. Just got back from a long trip partly at night, had lot of bugs on the front of car and it took them right off without issues. They raised the price $7 dollars since I bought it, which I am not sure it is worth that high of a pricetag, but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Restorer is 100% GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pkg of waterless wash + plastic / rubber restorer spray. The wash product is fine; seems to work well. But the restorer product is absolutely MARVELOUS! Easy to use, makes a significant improvement (darkens) plastic pieces, doesn't seem to stain paint, and comes off paint and window surfaces easily. I have a convertible, and this stuff made a MAJOR improvement on boot, tops of doors, tops of dash - all those places that get bleached by the sun. I read previous rave reviews on this product -- they were absolutely right!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great But...
customer_reviews.text: Bug and sap removal, I don't know about that. This product works great in maintaining your car weekly after a proper wash. If your car is really dirty, has bird crap, sap or bug strikes it's best to hose it down first. The instructions are great and so was the cloth that came with it. I've used this on my Civic and Forrester after 1.5 week of a proper wash and they both looked clean and waxed after using this. I would purchase again and suggest it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Trinova waterless car wash does as it says; perfect shine with own wax that the bottle contains in combination when previously used Trinova Paint Sealant. Sorry for the bluried pics. captured from video.
customer_reviews.author: Ergin

customer_reviews.title: Best waterless wash and wax on the market
customer_reviews.text: Trinova has really done an outstanding job with this product. I use this stuff everyday. It strips dirt away from any smooth surface with ease making it not only a great waterless wash and wax for my car, but also a versatile cleaner to have around the garage. Especially because you get SO MUCH in one bottle lol. I've been making it like 4x the recommended strength and still not even halfway through it. They say it's good for 50+ car washes and id wager more like 200. Shines and cleans great though. Dont use if really dirty. That said, it's pretty good at getting really really dirty stuff clean too lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tazmania

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. This stuff really does a great job at cleaning without the use of water or other solutions. I have a black car and was hesitant to try this stuff as I was worried about the dirt scratching the finish or causing swirls, but it did an awesome job. I did have to go over the car a second time, but I am very happy with this product and will buy it again. The one bottle goes a long way as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Emery

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. Really does clean and leaves a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Really does clean and leaves a bit of a shine. Not quite like a traditional wash/wax, but if you don't want to bother with that or water, or have no access to water, or you are environmentally conscious and not wanting to waste water, this setup is perfect. Easy to pour, lasts for awhile, easy to apply. May need a couple coats depending on how dirty your car is. Note: Be careful not to drop the microfiber towel so it doesn't get a bunch of dirt and leaves all over it and then wipe your car and risk scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this on my car a few times and haven’t seen amazing results but it did work to clean my car. My only gripe was that I thought the spray bottle would come filled along with the other bottle. The description does say it’s a kit but I don’t remember reading that it’s an empty spray bottle. Regardless the product inside the bottle is what it says it is. And the microfiber cloth is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Waterless Carwash
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Follow the instructions on the bottle for use. Saturate the area you are working on. Start small. Depending on the weather, I spray and area and wipe it dry. Once I do the entire car. I go over the entire thing with a dry rag. I’ve gotten the best results doing this. I have used this on literally everything. Motorcycles, cars, fridges, etc. anything that can shine. It leaves a coating on whatever you spray it on. Makes my black car look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ginter

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is.
customer_reviews.text: Filled bottle with the measured liquid and with filtered water and used it on my dusty truck and it works pretty well along with the supplied microfiber which is of high quality.Now it could have worked better if the spray bottle was of better quality, squeeze the handle and have of the solution would run down my hand, I will look for a better spray bottle next time.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white car, and park under trees. A cherry tree to be exact. Every spring, my car looks like a pink parade float. Those petals leave brown dead flower marks all over my ride. Car washes don't cut it, and we don't have hoses where I live. So, I needs an option. I read the reviews, and had to try it. Did such an amazing job. I had to work some areas harder than others to get those petal rings off, yet my car looks so clean and shiny. And, it is slick. I put a rag on the hood and it slid right off. I would give it more than 5 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: MomToJax14

customer_reviews.title: ... was simple to use and it gave me a good shine, water beaded up
customer_reviews.text: The product was simple to use and it gave me a good shine, water beaded up, but it was not a Meguiar's level finish. But it will do for a quick was and wax, but I think I will put a REAL coat of wax on before winter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Finally ran out of the previous product I was using by Car Enthusiasts so I bought this. I wonder if it is same product since the concentrate bottle is of the same design. Like the fact this came with a spray bottle and a soft microfiber towel. Tried it for first time on my steel blue CX-5 and my wife's silver C300 and I have to say I'm pretty impressed. The product easily lifted off the dirt and left a really nice slick finish. For those of us living in apartments/condos with a shared carport in SoCal, the waterless car wash products are a great way to save money and water.
customer_reviews.author: pcguy63

customer_reviews.title: Awesome waterless wash!
customer_reviews.text: Just washed my ceramic pro coated car using this product and man this stuff really works! I tend to waterless wash my car every other week and being able to make more of this product is perfect for my needs. I also have to mention that it has a great smell and the included microfiber towel feels premium. Will definitely buy again once I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jurgeen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I've been leery of products like this, but it looks like the tech has ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I've been leery of products like this, but it looks like the tech has come a long way over the years. I trusted this on a brilliant red paint job and it exceeded expectations: no discernible swirl marks (at least no new ones that weren't already there). Works well on the windows without streaking or hazing. As explained, it's probably not good for heavy dirt (risk of scratching the paint). Based on the dilution instructions, this should last a while. Would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: hnferdo

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I love the unique dispenser bottle that pre-measures what you need to put in the spray bottle, then you just add water. I do not have a water source to wash my car regularly. This works great -I previously used another brand that is no longer available- found this - it's a good dupe. Car was squeaky clean - even used it on my windows.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP! THIS STUFF IS MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: HOLY CRAP! THIS STUFF IS MAGIC. Writing in behalf of my bf but WOW! This stuff is amazing. He went back and forth forever so if you are too, JUST GET IT! Honestly it looked amazingly clean and he only used one rag. Idk what's in this but it's pure magic and will leave your care looking AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney & Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works exactly as advertised. My car windshield is bird poop magnet no matter what I do and this stuff clears it right off. I mixed the recommended amount with water and then sprayed onto my car. Wipes clean without residue and doesn't take a lot of the spray to clean my car. I cleaned the whole car with not even half the bottle (just 1/2 quart of the the solution mixed with the bottle of water). The car looks like it came out of the car wash. It looks like it's going to last me a long time -- definitely well worth the money. Would buy again and would highly recommend it to a friend. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: May M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. My car sits in in the garage, so I can clean a little bit at the time. You don't need the water hose, so there is no mess. I'm really surprised at how well it cleans. Good friends recently bought a new car, first one in years, because they've been out of the country, so I gave them a gift of this. Because it's concentrated, it lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! i was originally looking for a different product ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! i was originally looking for a different product that i purchased from amazon. But this works just as great and is cheaper too! It works exactly the same and they even throw in the spray bottle and towel (w/c the other one didn't)
customer_reviews.author: Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is Great!, Although I used it on a truck ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is Great!, Although I used it on a truck that was relatively clean it went on and wiped off like water! I have a black SUV and it left a great shine and covered a lot of the fine scratches and swirl marks quickly while I was in a parking lot waiting for the lady couple if days later it stormed and water beaded off quickly and dried spot free!!!. Im sure I will be using this as sort of an advanced quick wax, the towel and spray bottle make it well worth the few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was skeptical about using waterless wash but I have a burgundy pickup and I struggle to keep it clean. I had looked into various waterless washes and decided on this one. I am currently on the 2nd bottle of the concentrate/water mix. I find that going over it once as a wash then once as a wax works best. What really sold me was it rained and it stayed rather clean after driving all afternoon in the rain. It is nice to have this option to keep it clean. This picture was after I used it and it snowed ha.
customer_reviews.author: CountryMouse233

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weekly or light/moderate maintenance "washes". While it's not a replacement for a "real" wash, you can get away with performing them less often. It's especially useful after getting hit by a sprinkler or bugs. I am able to clean a mid-sized car with half a bottle of the diluted product, so I expect to get at least 40 uses out of this. It does not streak on my black car as long as I work on a cool surface, but I do have minor streaking when it's warm. Bring a buffing towel just in case. Also, this product is PERFECT for cleaning door jambs
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It cleans and waxes as stated. Not for very muddy vehicles. If you keep up weekly it works great. This is third purchase. Use on 31 ft travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice formula for a great value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the product but for the value I could not resist. I added 1/2 oz and I filled water all the way, the water didn't run down and stayed on the surface so there were no watermarks and the scent was very nice, gentle. cleaned the dust and dirt without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love this product - Trinova waterless wash & wax
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time I bought the waterless wash & wax. I did not realize this product exists until I found it in Amazon. It really works! It is so easy to apply and my car shines after cleaning with Trinova waterless wash & wax. I also like the product because it is very economical as I can dilute with water and use it many times. I will certainly buy this product again and I would recommend anyone to give it a trial.
customer_reviews.author: Ho Kuen Alfred Li

customer_reviews.title: Made my car shiny
customer_reviews.text: Appreciated this. Of course, hosing off the mud in the wheel wells is the only thing I needed to do outside of spraying and wiping. Made my black car nice and shiny. Bottle provided leaked in steam mode but ok in spray mode. Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kai Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, will use on everything!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to shine up my camper. Did some spot tests on the painted surfaces, aluminum trim, and stainless. So for works great. Will need to wait of the weather to warm up before completely cleaning camper. Will also test on a classic car I have. While waiting, I tested on my stainless steel appliances, and wow, does a much better job than the appliance cleaners I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Spamhater007

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Can get about 12 spray bottles from each container. Works out to under 2 bucks each unit. Smells good like febreeze and water does bead up on paint. It leaves a shimmer on clearcoat that lasts about almost a week. Needs weekly application.
customer_reviews.author: jebediah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have been using TriNova Waterless Car Wash for several years. It is a great product. Easy to use and leaves your vehicle clean and with a nice shine. Also like that a microfiber towel is included. Good value if you are looking for an easy to use detailer.
customer_reviews.author: wingman50

customer_reviews.title: Unintentional surprise ( for the good)
customer_reviews.text: The product works great . I actually was looking for a different product when I ordered this by mistake. I was disappointed when it arrived but u had to give it a try. I was totally impressed with it and although I would like to have seen how the other product worked, I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE - left smudges all over my car
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly horrible. I used it on my 1 month old car it left marks and smudges everywhere. Took me 2 hours to clean it to be remotely satisfied and then ended up going to a car wash anyways because it looked horrible in the sunlight. I just hope it didn’t ruin any of my paint. Since the company offers a satisfaction guaranteed, I want a refund. Update: the company has impeccable customer service. So I’ve upgraded my review for that.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this product in place of getting car washes weekly. The product is okay.. not amazing. It is good to use between regular washes but not in place of. Car is shiny after use and it is convenient between washes if car gets a bit dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Tried it based on a recommendation in my forum
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! THIS really works!!! While not 100% waterless....you catch the drift. You dilute the solution with about 12-16oz of WATER that's IT!!!! Cleaned up nicely, mirror finish and although it has a wax, it's not too much of a buildup (read no streaks!!!) I was able to completely hand wash my beloved Model S in less than 40 mins....(not including windows/glass/mirrors). LOVE the ideas: 1. Clean in anywhere and anytime 2. Only need the microfiber and my chamois (optional) NO buckets/hoses/sponges etc.... Great product
customer_reviews.author: RealLoveIs

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful that this product would work, but was pleasantly surprised. Off course the car I used it on was pretty clean to begin with. It was nice to clean the car without water soap buckets etc. The product leaves a nice nice shine with a nice waxy feel. I've used it twice and he been pleased with the result both times. If your car is muddy or filthy this product is not for you. It's great for maintenance to keep your car clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for after car wash detailing and protection
customer_reviews.text: I know it says waterless car wash, but if you use it AFTER you wash your car, it will amaze you.. it’s like an easy polishing, waxing for your car. First bottle lasted almost a year. Really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: yobochef

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It works amazingly. Gives a great clean, the car dirt comes right off and provides an excellent squeaky clean wax shine. I'm really happy that I don't have to use water anymore and living in the city it is very difficult to access a hose or affordable car wash. I highly recommend this environmentally friendly product to anyone that likes to keep their car looking like new. Also, I love the cloth that comes with the product. It's a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is super intuitive, and makes it convenient when diluting the right amount of concentrate. While it is not meant clean off hardened dirt, it does a could job of maintaining inbetween full washes. The reason for a 4 instead of a 5, is that it feels like it is a suped up or a concentrate version of a quick detailer. Cause it kind of does everything a quick detailer does.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After hearing rave reviews from a family member, I borrowed some to treat my car. I was so blown away at the amazing job it does, I ordered right away. Bugs and dirt barely stick and clean off with amazing ease. Fantastic value too when you consider how many bottles you can make with the concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit today and thought I'd try it out on my winter-dirty Mustang. I am beyond pleased with the result (it took me about 35 minutes). I used the cloth supplied as part of the kit to wipe after spraying and then a cleaner cloth to finish polishing. This is one of the neatest products I've ever purchased. (P.S. I'm a 74 year old grandmother.)
customer_reviews.author: Myra Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly as an after wash touch up. It safely helps you remove water spots and missed spots. I love that this is a concentrated product and I can dilute when I need it. Decent price considering how much you get.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Convertible
customer_reviews.text: I have a Camaro Convertible and I don't want to take it through an automative carwash. I also live in Orange County California where water is very expensive. I have used this product twice now and am very impressed with the results. Best part no water and it only takes about 15 minutes to clean my car.
customer_reviews.author: Music Specialist

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you first hand If I had not washed my own car with this stuff I would not believe it. This stuff is amazing!!! You just spray it on and wipe away. I washed my 2001 Tahoe in 20 minutes compared to 1+ with bucket and water. I will use this stuff forever and on all my cars. I highly recommend this product. You will not be disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miranda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I previously polished and waxed my car ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I previously polished and waxed my car and I wanted to try a waterless product. This one caught my eye. I had some light road dust on the car so I applied the wash/wax kit. In 15 minutes my car was clean with a very deep rich hue on the finish. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KWD

customer_reviews.title: ... fiber towel and the cleaning agent it’s self are awesome! The spray bottle needs to go straight in ...
customer_reviews.text: The micro fiber towel and the cleaning agent it’s self are awesome! The spray bottle needs to go straight in the trash. The cleaner is so good I could not give less than 5 stars. I washed my wife’s FILTHY car with it first and it turned out great. It cleaned the windows without streaking and cleaned off bug grime perfect. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! What and Amazing Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use of this product is Awesome!!! I was able to clean two vehicles in about 30 minutes, when it normally takes 45 minutes to an hour to wash and wax one car. When I am finished, the clean and shine looks as if my vehicles were professionally cleaned. This product exceeds its value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bishop W. T. Davis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is by far the best water-less car wash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is by far the best water-less car wash I have ever used. If you are lazy like me and don't feel like getting wet, toweling off, and waxing your jeep this stuff is exactly what you have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: makes a lot and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I tried it because it was concentrated and will last longer than the brand I've been using. It works just as good and will last many times longer. I use it for my cars and my motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: ... Wash and Wax Kit yesterday and I am in love! This car cleaner is wonderful and does exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the TriNova Waterless Car Wash and Wax Kit yesterday and I am in love! This car cleaner is wonderful and does exactly what it says it will. I had taken my 2013 Nissan Altima to a car wash 2 days prior, so my car was not in bad shape. I did have some white residue from it raining yesterday and TriNova took it right off! The microfiber towel is really soft and does not absorb the product, like microfiber towels. Overall, this is a great product and I recommend it to anyone that likes to keep their car clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jalon Wells

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my classic cars for keeping that perfect look at car cruise-ins. This car wash/wax is awesome. Did the entire car and windows in like 15 minutes and only used like 10 sprays from the bottle. This was faster and easier than my other detail products for half the price. I am impressed and happy. Great job Trinova. pic of my cars below.
customer_reviews.author: joemish

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier. After reading through all the reviews
customer_reviews.text: First experience with a waterless Car Wash. I couldn't be happier. After reading through all the reviews, I rinsed off my dust and mud ridden car and "washed" section by section. Super easy and left my white car gleaming. Still have 2/3rds of bottle left. Very cost efficient and effective product
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Works better than water car wash kits!
customer_reviews.text: I used this because I have well water which leaves water spots. I decided to try this product as an alternative and my car cleaned up better than if I had used water. I was really surprised and expected to see scratches from the dirt getting smudged around on the paint but everything just came right off. No scratches and paint looks incredible after a cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Good for touch-up cleaning only
customer_reviews.text: If your car is already 80% clean, this product does a good job of getting that last 20% to make it look good. However, if you even have mild-to-moderate amount of dirt on the car, all this does is move the dirt around.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing! So easy to apply and so easy to take off. My only suggestion is that you still wash your car before applying and once your micro fiber starts getting damp, change cloths. This will eliminate any swirls.
customer_reviews.author: Baracus

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy cleaning my cars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy cleaning my cars. Been cleaning my own cars and motorcycles for over 50 years. Always got top dollar for my vehicles when I sold them. This product is very easy to use and leaves a beautiful shine on the vehicle. Highly recommend. Even removed old bird boop stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome new addition to the detail kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! Works great and goes a long way!!! Apply and clean with one cloth and buff quickly with a microfiber and you are looking fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: michael r davis

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Waterless Car Wash and Wax Kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use as a waterless car wash. Leave a smooth shine which lasts for a short time. I use a ceramic detail spray to give my truck a longer lasting shine.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: From MAD to pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Almost returned it without opening the box. I was looking for F11. Amazon search gave me this one. I thought I was getting Topcoat. I read the instructions, (really easy) mixed it and tried it. My bike looked great. The smooth touch is still there. I like it. I will try it on my truck the other bike. Seems to be a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: WHIP MASTER

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it the most for taking bug off the front of my car and the work truck. Cleans the bed and boxes well when I have down time and no water.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Solid value buy.
customer_reviews.text: Generally good. But great on glass and needs to be cleaned off afterwards. Lots of concentrate for the money. You'll need extra towels.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- it takes very little effort to keep my new car looking clean and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Waterless Car Wash every few days to wipe away the accumulated winter grime from the visible outer surfaces of my new metallic silver 2017 Honda Accord. The instructions are clear and the product is easy to use. So far it has been doing the job quite well in maintaining that new car look, as if I had just driven it out of the showroom.
customer_reviews.author: Beartrap88

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've used about half a first mix bottle and so far I love it. I use it to wipe down the boat after each use and it keeps the hull shiny and the water beads up like a fresh wax. I think this is going to save me money over time from buying single bottles of the competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not only is the TriNova product easy to use and effective but it is also more ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Extra benefit is that, unlike some competitive products, a spray bottle is provided. Some others require a 16 ounce spray bottle to use.. Not only is the TriNova product easy to use and effective but it is also more convenient to take on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ira B. Korman

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: A must-have for Wrangler owners. I have a 2 door soft top and this makes keeping my Wrangler so clean and it's super easy especially how busy life gets. I hose off all the mud first and then spray and wipe. Tri Nova makes life easy so I can enjoy the trial! Thanks Guys
customer_reviews.author: mike a

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the result
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be using a waterless car wash. I researched a lot about this topic online and talked to local detailers. I'm pleased with the result. I use this product at least once a week, and it keeps my vehicle clean. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: CPABUG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: It beads water off my car afterwards. It has a separte part of the bottle for measurements, it came with a nice microfiber cloth. This product was really good but I do still recommend getting a good rinse like they mention as well in on the car before the use of it. No scratches but still paranoid just smearing dirt and debris around my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jpan7990

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent solution for keeping your car looking great with minimum fuss. Just one bottle will last quite a while, as it only requires a little of the actual wash concentrate in the spray bottle. You can't beat the pricepoint and results on this right now. My 2019 Type-R looks fantastic after a good TriNova wash.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent touch up product especially after going through a car ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent touch up product especially after going through a car wash. Removes the water spots and gives a great shine.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on Amazon and thought that it was a good deal for sure. After I used it I was able to get a good idea on how good it works. I think I really got a good deal on a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Aim z

customer_reviews.title: Liking this
customer_reviews.text: Simple to mix and quite effective. My car is shining and looking as good as new. So far, I'm liking this and intend to purchase the paint sealant and protection unit. I'll buy it again. 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: KS-RPSGT

customer_reviews.title: You can mix a lot of bottles
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much product this can make. It is very nice that it is concentrated so I always have a bottle on hand whenever my car needs a quick cleaning. I won't have to buy expensive bottles of quick detailed ever again. Will buy again when I am finally out. The microfiber towel is a nice add on too.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverAKid

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Wash and Wax
customer_reviews.text: Very economical way maintain a great finish! Spray bottle delivers an even mist application while the concentrate container ensures you have ease of preparation. Beads water and produces a good shine on initial application, with good results on glass and trim.
customer_reviews.author: Bristolpistol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery. Great product! Perfect for my black Harley Davidson.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mann

customer_reviews.title: Best value waterless wash and wax!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many waterless wash and wax products. This Trinova concentrate works just as well as the others and I see it lasting a very long time. Use distilled water with it and it works excellently!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but works very well. Great value compared to other products I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. IT worked exactly as promised. Left an amazing shine. I'm very happy with this item. I've already told a couple of my neighbors, who saw me out using it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible as long as your car isn't caked in mud it'll clean it in no time. It even cleans chrome, bumpers and windows. I was able to clean my entire SUV with about a third of a spray bottle. And the fact that 1/2 ounce of concentrate makes a whole spray bottle, that's a lot of car washing in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! Never easier to wash your car
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Never easier to wash your car, and it looks great for weeks. I will be using this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sean E Fox

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up from a detailer of over 15 years exp.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful cleaner and superior shine. I love how you can make several bottles for the same price as one from the other guys. Moreover, it busts through big guts with ease, leaves a slick and shiny finish, and doesn’t smell harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for cheap stuff. I only use it as a instant deitaler to remove bird crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this product was so easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I don't spend a lot of time on my car, but this product was so easy to apply, take off and make my car shine beautifully. I was going on a road trip, so I decided to try it on my windows. They still got dirty, but cleaned off superbly!
customer_reviews.author: Carol E.

customer_reviews.title: Old Car Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, works perfectly on my old TR3. I do not like to spray it because trapped water is the enemy of old cars. No spraying, looks like the paint is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton E Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product highly especially if your car is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheen are my car has lasted for quite some time after only one use. I would recommend this product highly especially if your car is not subject to heavy elements. I park underground and in an arid environment with lots of dust. I followed the recommended procedures of wiping away buildup by using a soft hand held brush to remove the dust buildup and then applied the waterless car wash. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Di Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I expected but this is everything I wanted it to be! Sprays on easily and wipes in delivering a quick and easy shine that lasts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great spray wax/finish
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my classic VW car as well as my 2017 Golf GTI. This is a great spray wax/finish, but I would recommend some latex gloves since the polymers seem to stick to the skin and I'm not sure how good that is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dennim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works good! My car looked so much better and it really does use very little water.
customer_reviews.author: cherokeelilcreek1160

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great ! Better than many other products that I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gemellaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. I use it in between car washes and just after an auto wash. I definitely recommend this to those who want to keep their vehicle looking good.
customer_reviews.author: MGN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this product. Did a pretty decent job. Got our first good rail so the wax part isn't that great. But over all happy with my purchase. Updated 04/03/17... I really like the ease of use. Now that I've used it a few times, just have a couple towels and your good to go...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gee

customer_reviews.title: An awesome waterless car wash
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many TriNova products, along with Chemical Guys and Gtechniq. TriNova's Waterless Car Wash is my favorite quick detailer to use so far. The other companies also make great products but this is just my opinion. It wipes off clean and shines real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Van Huynh

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with these products
customer_reviews.text: I have a car that is 21 years old and after I used these products on my car everyone asked what I used because my car shined so much. The waterless car wash is very concentrated so you don't use much. I'm very pleased with these products.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you apply in cool temperatures because heat from the sun makes it dry ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this waterless car wash. I puts a protective barrier on my truck that helps dirt and bugs wipe off with ease. Make sure you apply in cool temperatures because heat from the sun makes it dry too quick and streak. It makes my black paint job really shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and very good results
customer_reviews.text: nice product , left the car clean and shiny , just wish it was better at removing bugs , we are in the middle of lovebug season here in Florida , I sprayed the cleaner liberally on the front end , but still had to scrub like hell to remove all the bug guts.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for quick washes. Mixes easy, spray it on, wipe it and then buff it and your car will shine bright. No need for using gallons of water. Especially in the desert.
customer_reviews.author: fragsinvt

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product!!! Survived 2 heavy downpours (Thunderstorms) and still had its shine and repellant quality.. For best result, I decided to rinse my car off first; then conduct a quick wipe down.....Following the Wipe down, I then used the waterless car wash...
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: I have used TriNova twice, it rained the day ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used TriNova twice, it rained the day after I used it the first time. It is so much easier to use than a hose and water that I didn't even mind. It leaves no water spots on the paint and when it did rain the wax repelled most of the rain water. I did learn when I was driving and the sun was about to set that I need another product for the windows. I intend to use TriNova Waterless Wash & Wax on my paint for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to buff and shine
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once. Was very easy to buff and shine, also used to do mountain bikes. The surface of the vehicle had pollen, but no caked on dirt. Will update after it has gone through the $3 car wash. For the money it is better than the any spray waxI have bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Better as a Quick Detailer
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend that one gets their vehicle well detailed first (strip current wax (wash w/ Dawn) and clay bar) and then apply. I did so....and the result was excellent. And, the car seems to stay cleaner. Picture of 2013 GMC Terrain... Good product and value.
customer_reviews.author: S.Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Gret Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, especially if you enjoy the rewards of washing and waxing you own vehicle. This product is awesome! Use it correctly and no need to wash your vehicle for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Water and rain washes it off
customer_reviews.text: Looks good to start with. But any water or rain washes the finish off Not like hard wax that lasts
customer_reviews.author: Matt Settlemire

product_meta.title: TriNova Waterless Car Wash and Wax Kit - Bug Remover - Clean and Protect Paint of Truck, SUV, Boat, RV or Vehicle with one Quick Application. Concentrated Formula for Best Value
feature_bullets: ✅ 40 WASHES - Just 1/2 ounce of concentrate makes a full bottle, more than enough to clean a standard sized car 40+ times.
✅ SCRATCH-FREE - Specially designed to encapsulate dirt, grime, and residue to wipe off without scratching paint
✅ PROTECTION - Provides a protective coat that repels water and blocks harmful UV rays
✅ CONVENIENT - No hoses, no buckets, no mess. Just spray on, and wipe off. Better cleaner than washing with soap alone!

✅ BEST VALUE ON AMAZON - Unlike other waterless washes out there, our concentrated formula makes about 30+ bottle.That's about 75 cents a bottle. You can't beat that price! PLUS: With our 100% satisfaction guarantee, if you don't absolutely love this product - just tell us and we'l refund the purchase price! NO RISK.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars609 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
